text: Taking a deep breath, Rocco scurried out and grabbed the cheese! The other animals cheered for him!
scene: Rocco, with the cheese in his tiny paws, surrounded by smiling animals, their eyes sparkling with delight.

character.name: Rocco
character.description: A small, gray rat with big, bright eyes and a fluffy tail. He is timid and loves cheese but is afraid to talk to other animals.
